crawlers

Interface ICrawler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrawlerBase

    public interface ICrawler
    This interface defines main methods of the crawler object.

    Crawler is responsible for navigating the document corpus and analyzing its single elements

    Author:
    Pdz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds another IAnalyzer object to the ICrawler

      Starts crawling the provided document corpus

      Processes single document
      PairDataUnitAnalysis crawl(IDataUnitElemental input)
      Processes single elemental data unit
      IDataUnitDoc generateDataUnitDocLevel(IDataUnitDoc input)
      Generates empty document to be filled by the analyzer
